changeSet.author: pycoignard (generated)
changeSet.comment: insert competence requise fictive pour team 1
changeSet.sql: SET @team = "${t1}"; INSERT INTO competence_requise ( note, equipe_id, competence_id) VALUES ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 ), ( FLOOR(RAND() * 4)+1 , @team , FLOOR(RAND() * 209)+1 );
